ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Running With Selo's
ygData.msgSnippet: You probably all have comparable computers/connections/whatever.  I m always falling behind in my groups.  Fortunately we re usually using my song, so they re
ygData.messageBody:
You probably all have comparable computers/connections/whatever. I'm always
falling behind in my groups. Fortunately we're usually using my song, so
they're all forced to slow down & wait.

Glad to hear /follow has been fixed. I petitioned about that almost a year
ago I think. Anyone tried it?

Peace
Evulia, bard of 10 verses, Tunare

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Papa Legba [mailto:legba@...]
> Sent: Thursday, March 30, 2000 2:41 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Running With Selo's
>
>
> When our group is traveling, we need to use the Bard's Selo's. (SInce
> we have n druid/shaman). It really pretty simple to keep everyone
> together. One person leads (who knows the run) and the rest follow.
> The bard CANNOT lead.
>
> We have run across antonica many times, with very few stops ever...
> --
> We now return to the non-stop rock.
>
> Matt DeBarger
>
